text:
viqSE janA#yaq mahiq Sarma# yacCataM | 
dIqrGapra#yajyuqmatiq yO va#nuqShyati# vaqyaM ja#yEmaq pRuta#nAsu dUqDhya#H || 
A nO#mitrAvaruNAq>15, prabAqhavA$>16 ||
tvaM nO# agnEq varu#Nasya viqdvAn dEqvasyaq hEDO&va# yAsi sIShThAH | 
yaji#ShThOq vahni# tamaqH SOSu#cAnOq viSvAq dvEShA(gm)#siq pramu#mugdhyaqsmat ||
sa tvaMnO# agnE&vaqmO Ba#vOqtI nEdi#ShThO aqsyA uqShasOq vyu#ShTau | 
ava# yakShva nOq varu#Naq(gm)q - [  ]  72
